尾.definition: horse's tail; pointed posterior section of a locust etc

尾大不掉.definition: large tail obstructs action (idiom); bottom heavy; fig. rendered ineffective by subordinates

尾子.definition: tail; end; small change; odd sum remaining after large round number

尾張國.definition: Owari or Owari-no-kuni, Japanese fiefdom during 11th-15th century, current Aichi prefecture around Nagoya

尾數.definition: remainder (after rounding a number); decimal part (of number after the decimal point); mantissa (i.e. fractional part of common logarithm in math.); small change; balance (of an account)

尾期.definition: final period; the end (of a term); the close

尾梢.definition: the tip; the end; the very end

尾欠.definition: balance due; small balance still to pay; final remaining debt

尾水.definition: tailwater; outflow (from mill or power plant)

尾流.definition: wake (trailing behind a ship, airplane etc); slipstream

尾班.definition: last service (of train, bus, boat etc)

尾生.definition: Wei Sheng (legendary character who waited for his love under a bridge until he was drowned in the surging waters); sb who keeps to their word no matter what

尾礦.definition: mining waste; waste remaining after processing ore; tailings

尾礦庫.definition: slag heap; dump of mining waste

尾綴.definition: (lit.) to follow sb; (linguistics) suffix; ending; (computing) file name extension

尾翼.definition: empennage (of an aircraft); fletching (of an arrow); fins (of a missile, rocket etc); rear spoiler (of a car)

尾號.definition: last digit (or last few digits) of a phone number, license plate number etc

尾蚴.definition: tailed larva; Cercaria (microscopic larva of parasitic Miracidium flatworm)

尾部.definition: back part; rear section; tail section

尾隨.definition: to tail behind; to tag along; to follow on the heels of

尾音.definition: final sound of a syllable; rhyme (e.g. in European languages)
